Dear Mr. Tesla,

I was extremely excited to find the software engineer backend position on StepStone and I would like to apply for the role. After reading the job description and the responsibilities of the role, I am confident that my background, along with my skills and experiences, would be a good fit for the position.

I am Adrian Radu, a Python Backend programmer with a Bachelor's degree in Graphic Design. As a Backend programmer, I cherish the opportunity to be constantly learning and keeping up with industry developments. I have a proven track record of building and operating scalable systems. I have also been an advocate for maintaining the highest quality bar and making sure that quality and testing is included in the development work from a project's beginning.

My experience includes knowledge in design patterns, data structures, and algorithms. I have extensive experience in developing high-quality software in modern programming languages like Python and TypeScript, and I am highly skilled in modern software development tools and systems such as Docker, Git, and Linux. I have experience working in cross-functional agile teams and have a passion and eagerness to learn new tools, technologies, and practices.

I have experience in working in true DevOps teams and with automated software testing, Continuous Integration, and Continuous Delivery practices. Additionally, I also have experience in infrastructure provisioning tools like Terraform.

I would love to be part of one of your Communities of Practice as a Software Engineer Backend and contribute to the team's overall efficiency and effectiveness through setting an example of best software development practices. 

Thank you for considering my application. I am excited about this opportunity and looking forward to meeting you in person. Please find my resume attached to this letter.

Sincerely,

Adrian Radu
